titleInfo.title: Temporal dynamics in δ13C of ecosystem respiration in response to environmental changes
Stable isotopes as indicators of ecological change

bibliographicCitation.wels: Werner, C.; Unger, S.; Pereira, J. S.; Ghashghaie, J.; Máguas, C. (2007): Temporal dynamics in δ13C of ecosystem respiration in response to environmental changes. In: Todd E. Dawson; Rolf T.W. Siegwolf (Hrsg.): Stable isotopes as indicators of ecological change . San Diego: Elsevier Academic Press. (Terrestrial ecology series, ). S. 193-210.
